src:
Vulić: Rezultat će zavisiti od cele ekipe, ne treba ovo porediti sa Liverpulom
05 Nov 2019, 13:55 by Zile
Fudbaler Crvene zvezde, Miloš Vulić, izneo je svoja očekivanja pred meč sa Totenhemom.
Vezista crveno-belih ocenio je da očekuje potpuno drugačiju utakmicu u odnosu na onu u Londonu.
– Suvišno je pričati o kvalitetu ekipe Totenhema. Mislim da smo u Londonu ušli dobro u utakmicu, igrali smo ofanzivo, imali veliki broj udaraca na gol. Međutim primili smo rano pogodak i morali da se otvorimo u ranom delu utakmice. To je veliki hendikep naročito protiv ekipe sa brzim igračima kakva je Totenhem. Sutra očekujem potpuno drugačiju utakmicu, pre svega zbog pune Marakane, imaćemo veliku podršku naših navijača. Njihovo prisustvo daće nam vetar u leđa da od prvog minuta izađemo maksimalno motivisano i da se borimo koliko možemo, izjavio je Vulić.
– Siguran sam da će rezultat na kraju zavisiti od cele ekipe. Moramo da budemo maksimalno kompaktni, jer ekipa kao što to je Totehnhem uspeva da kazni i najmanju grešku. Mi se spremamo maksimalno za utakmicu, imamo video analize koje nam dosta pomažu. U prvoj utakmici smo uvideli njihove prednosti i mane što ćemo pokušati da iskoristimo.
Vulić u karijeri nije imao mnogo prilika da igra protiv tako dobro fizički pripremljenih igrača.
– Nisam imao puno prilike da igram sa tako dobro fizički pripremljenim igračima, koji igraju na vrhunskom nivou. Utakmica se igra pod pritiskom svih devedeset minuta, nema mnogo vremena za razmišljanje. Treba igrati sa što manje dodira. Sigurno da sam poučen iskustvom sa prve utakmice i ukoliko budem bio u sastavu promeniću neke stvari u igri. Mislim da nema nikakve potrebe porediti utakmicu protiv Liverpula sa sutrašnjom protiv Totenhema, različiti su timovi, sezone takođe. Ono što je sigurno da ćemo dati sve od sebe i rezultat će na kraju doći kao nagrada, zaključio je Vulić.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Vulic: The result will depend on the whole team, this should not be compared to Liverpool
05 Nov 2019, 12:55 by Zile
Red Star footballer Milos Vulic has voiced his expectations ahead of the match with Tottenham.
The red and white midfielder said he expected a completely different match from the one in London.
- Needless to say, the quality of the Tottenham team. I think we got into the game well in London, we played offensive, we had a lot of shots on goal. However, we received an early shot and had to open early in the game. That's a big handicap especially against a team with fast players like Tottenham. I expect a completely different game tomorrow, primarily because of the full Marakana, we will have a lot of support from our fans. Their presence will give us a breeze in the back to get as motivated from the first minute and fight as we can, Vulic said.
- I'm sure the result will ultimately depend on the whole team. We have to be as compact as possible, because a team like Tottenham manages to punish even the smallest mistake. We are getting ready for the match, we have video analyzes that help us a lot. In the first game we saw their advantages and disadvantages that we will try to take advantage of.
Vulic didn't have many opportunities in his career to play against such well-prepared players.
- I have not had much opportunity to play with such well-trained players, who play at the top level. The game is played under pressure for all ninety minutes, there is not much time to think. It should be played with as little touch as possible. Surely I was taught by experience from the first game and if I was in the lineup I would change some things in the game. I don't think there is any need to compare the game against Liverpool with tomorrow against Tottenham, there are different teams, seasons too. What is certain is that we will do our best and the result will eventually come as a reward, Vulic concluded.
